T11n1238u_001:9: iha yadvastuno bhedābhedābhyāmabhidheyaṃ na bhavati tadvastu na bhavati |
T11n1238u_001:14: na hi vyaktibhyo bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ śakyamabhidhātum |
T11n1238u_001:16: tathā hi yadi tāvadvyaktibhyo'rthāntarameva sāmānyābhimataṃ vastu tadā kathaṃ tattāsāṃ sāmānyaṃ nāma |
T11n1238u_001:17: yat khalu yato'rthāntaraṃ na tattasya sāmānyam |
T11n1238u_001:21: nanu ca vyaktibhyo'rthāntaraṃ ca syāt sāmānyaṃ ca tāsāmiti |
T11n1238u_001:24: arthāntaraṃ cedarthāntarasya sāmānyaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya sāmānyaṃ syādviśeṣābhāvāditi |
T11n1238u_001:25: yaddhi khalvekaṃ vastvanekatra samavetaṃ tattadīyaṃ sāmānyam |
T11n1238u_001:26: goṣu cāśvo na samaveta iti kathamasau gavāṃ sāmānyaṃ syāditi kuto viśeṣābhāvaḥ |
T11n1238u_001:29: sa hi viśeṣo buddhimatā vaktavyo yaḥ sāmānyābhimatapadārthamātrabhāvī sannasaṃkareṇa vyavasthāmupapādayet |
T11n1238u_001:30: ayaṃ cānekārthasamavāyaḥ saṃkhyāsaṃyogakāyadravyādiṣvapyastīti tānyapi sāṃkhyādisaṃmatāni sāmānyāni syuḥ |
T11n1238u_001:32: satyapyanekārthasamavāye yadeva samānajñānābhidhānapravṛttinimittaṃ tadeva sāmānyaṃ nānyat |
T11n1238u_001:42: tatra yadi te svata eva samānāḥ saṃmāne jñānābhidhāna .....( )
T11n1238u_001:48: na tarhiī teṣāṃ sāmānyamasti samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyamityuktavānasi |
T11n1238u_001:49: asamānāṃ ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ |
T11n1238u_001:50: svayamasamānasvabhāvā api te naiva samānāsta iti cet |
T11n1238u_001:57: nanu yaiṣāṃ niṣpannatayā kṛñaḥ karmatā nāsti kathaṃ te kriyante nāma |
T11n1238u_001:58: syādetat, yena dharmirūpeṇa te niṣpannā na tena karoteḥ karmabhāvamanubhavanti |
T11n1238u_001:59: samānena punā rūpeṇa [ 3 a ] niṣpannāstena kriyanta iti na kiṃcidatrānupapannam |
T11n1238u_001:60: evaṃ tarhi tadeva samānaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyena kiyata iti syāt tasya ca bhāvaniṣpattāvaniṣpannasya kāraṇāntarataḥ paśvādupajāyamānasya tadbhāvatā brahmaṇāpyaśaktā sādhayitum |
T11n1238u_001:64: tathā ca tadapi bhedānāmasamānānāṃ kathaṃ sāmānyamiti paryanuyoge tenāpi tadvyatiriktasamānarūpakaraṇopagame satyaparāparakarmasāmānyaparikalpanātmakamanavasthānamapratividhānamāsajyate na ca bhedānāmasamānarūpaṃ pracyavate |
T11n1238u_001:66: na hyanyenānye samānā nāma pratīyante tadvanto nāma pratīyeran |
T11n1238u_001:68: anyathā hi yena kenacidapyanyena ye kecana samānāḥ pratīyeran pratiniyamanibandhanābhāvāt |
T11n1238u_001:73: atha teṣāṃ svāśrayeṣu samānajñānābhidhānasāmarthyābhāvādadoṣa eṣaḥ nanu sāmānyamapi bhedeṣvekatvānekasamavāyābhyāmeva samapratyayahetutayā parikalpitam
T11n1238u_001:74: tau vā'vayavyādīnāmapi yuṣmābhirabhyupetāviti teṣāmapi tathābhāvaḥ kathamapākiyeta |
T11n1238u_001:78: tathā hyekatvādeḥ samānatvātsāmānyābhimatabhāvavadārabhya dravyāderapi kiṃ na sāmānyarūpateti paryanuyoge samānapratyayāpratyayatvādityuttaramuktavānasi
T11n1238u_001:79: tatastadapi samānapratītinimittasya samānatvātsamānamavayavyāderapi kiṃ na syādityasmadīye punaḥ paryanuyoge sanyasāmānyarūpatvāditi bruvāṇaḥ
T11n1238u_001:81: tasya ca sākṣādekatvanityatve pratijñāya punarupadeśāntareṇa tata eva prativahatīti kathaṃ nonmataḥ |
T11n1238u_001:85: yadyapi hi sāmānyaṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ kevalābhyāṃ vācyaṃ na tathāpyavastu prakārāntarasyāpyubhayātmanā lakṣaṇasya saṃbhavādbhinnābhinnameva hi sāmānyaṃ jainajaiminīyāḥ pratijānate || yadāhuḥ ||
T11n1238u_001:101: ataśva vyaktibhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ bhinnamabhinnaṃ ceti bruvāṇo vyaktayaḥ sāmānyaṃ na ca vyaktayaḥ sāmānyamiti brūte |
T11n1238u_001:104: yadyadevaṃ na tadatadbhavati yathoṣṇaṃ vahrirūpaṃ nānuṣṇam |
T11n1238u_001:109: anyathā hi pratītiyathānusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo ... ... ... vaśātte nihnūyansa iti cet |
T11n1238u_001:111: [ 5 a] na saṃvido yuktibhirasti bādheti cet |
T11n1238u_001:112: nanu kimiyaṃ rājñāmājñā yenāvicārya gṛhyeta pratyakṣasvabhāvā saṃvit |
T11n1238u_001:113: tacca jyeṣṭhapramāṇamato na bādhyata iti cet |
T11n1238u_001:115: lakṣaṇayukte bādhāsaṃbhave tallakṣaṇameva dūṣitaṃ syāditi sarvatrānāśvāsaḥ |
T11n1238u_001:116: yathānumānābhāso bādhyate pratyakṣābhāso'pi kiṃ na bādhyate |
T11n1238u_001:118: pratyakṣaiva punariyaṃ saṃvittistatkathaṃ na bādhyata iti cet |
T11n1238u_001:120: atha pratyakṣameva pratyakṣasya tadābhāsatāṃ bādhyatvātsādhayati na tvanumānamityabhiniveśaḥ |
T11n1238u_001:121: kathaṃ tarhi jvālādiviṣayāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā vyaktyapekṣayā pratyakṣābhāsatā vyavasthāpyate |
T11n1238u_001:125: na śakyaṃ vaktuṃ sāmānyameva kevalaṃ tayā viṣayīkriyata iti tathābhāve hi tadevedaṃ buddhijvālātvamiti syāt na tu saiveyaṃ jvāleti |
